main event: A white light appeared to be hovering at 1000 feet with no movement or sound.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on a very clear night., The object was observed for a significant length of time., The absence of movement or sound leads to the possibility of it being an astronomical sighting., It was evaluated as a ground-radar observation., The position was fixed on a map submitted with the report.
sighted object: white light hovering in the sky
witness description: civil source, insufficient data for evaluation
